description: Inspired by Oboz's  hometown, the Bozeman Mid Waterproof features a combo of waterproof oiled nubuck leather and an abrasion-resistant woven textile made from 100% recycled Polyester fabric (rPET). Thoughtfully built using recycled and durable materials.
name: Oboz Bozeman Mid B-Dry - Mens

specs.value: Oiled Waterproof Nubuck Leather + 100% RPET Abrasion-resistant woven textile; B-DRY Waterproof Membrane
TPU Heel Clip, Dual Density Compression Molded EVA
Insoles made with Bloom Algae technology use sustainable algae biomass without compromising durability or comfort
Feet sweat and trails get muddy. That’s why they created their B-DRY waterproof system which lets sweat escape and keeps moisture out
Bozeman bottom package Inspired by the mountain lifestyle. Featuring a dual-density midsole with gender-specific tuning
